mapper.select: select datatype from browse group by datatype order by instr('ChromHMM,TF,TcoF,Histone,ATAC,Enhancer,Super_Enhancer,SNP,Methylation,LncRNA,mRNA',datatype)

select chr,start,end from gene_region where gene = #{gene}
select subclass from table_name where `set` = #{set}
select dataclass,count(*) as number from ${table} group by dataclass order by instr('ChromHMM,TF,TcoF,Histone,ATAC,Enhancer,Super_Enhancer,SNP,Methylation,LncRNA,mRNA',dataclass)
select subclass,count(*) as number from ${table} group by subclass

select dataclass,count(*) as number from ${table} where dataclass= #{datatype} and subclass = #{dataset} group by dataclass
select subclass,count(*) as number from ${table} where dataclass= #{datatype} and subclass = #{dataset} group by subclass

select * from ${table}
where dataclass like concat("%", #{searchValue}, "%") or subclass like concat("%", #{searchValue}, "%") or `set` like concat("%", #{searchValue}, "%") or num like concat("%", #{searchValue}, "%")

select * from ${table} where dataclass = #{datatype}
AND (subclass like concat("%", #{searchValue}, "%") or `set` like concat("%", #{searchValue}, "%") or num like concat("%", #{searchValue}, "%"))

select * from ${table} where subclass = #{dataset}
AND (dataclass like concat("%", #{searchValue}, "%") or `set` like concat("%", #{searchValue}, "%") or num like concat("%", #{searchValue}, "%"))

AND (`set` like concat("%", #{searchValue}, "%") or num like concat("%", #{searchValue}, "%"))

AND (dataclass like concat("%", #{searchValue}, "%") or subclass like concat("%", #{searchValue}, "%"))

AND (dataclass like concat("%", #{searchValue}, "%"))

SELECT distinct t.* FROM dnasei t WHERE Biosample_Type = "Cell Line" and Biosample_Name = "A549" and CHR = (select CHR from lncname_g where Regulation_regions = #{regulation} and lncRNA_name = #{lncnames}) and STAR > (select Start from lncname_g where Regulation_regions = #{regulation} and lncRNA_name = #{lncnames}) and (select End from lncname_g where Regulation_regions = #{regulation} and lncRNA_name = #{lncnames}) > END

SELECT distinct t.* FROM dnasei t WHERE Biosample_Type = "Cell Line" and Biosample_Name = "A549" and CHR = (select CHR from lncname_n where Regulation_regions = #{regulation} and lncRNA_name = #{lncnames}) and STAR > (select Start from lncname_n where Regulation_regions = #{regulation} and lncRNA_name = #{lncnames}) and (select End from lncname_n where Regulation_regions = #{regulation} and lncRNA_name = #{lncnames}) > END
select Biosample_type from dnasei_select group by Biosample_type
select tiss from dnasei_select where Biosample_type = #{Biosample_Type} group by tiss
select Biosample_name from dnasei_select where Biosample_type = #{Biosample_Type} and tiss = #{tiss} group by Biosample_name
select Biosample_Type from tf_select group by Biosample_Type
select Biosample_Name as label,Biosample_Name as value from tf_select where Biosample_Type = #{Biosample_Type_TF} group by Biosample_Name
select ID from TF_ID where Biosample_Name = #{Biosample_Name} group by ID
select ID from TF_ID where Biosample_Name = #{Biosample_Name}

SELECT * FROM ${tf_tablename} WHERE CHR = ( SELECT CHR FROM lncname_g WHERE Regulation_regions = #{regulation} AND lncRNA_name = #{lncnames} ) AND STAR > ( SELECT `Start` FROM lncname_g WHERE Regulation_regions = #{regulation} AND lncRNA_name = #{lncnames} ) AND ( SELECT `End` FROM lncname_g WHERE Regulation_regions = #{regulation} AND lncRNA_name = #{lncnames} ) >`END`

SELECT * FROM ${tf_tablename} WHERE CHR = ( SELECT CHR FROM lncname_n WHERE Regulation_regions = #{regulation} AND lncRNA_name = #{lncnames} ) AND STAR > ( SELECT `Start` FROM lncname_n WHERE Regulation_regions = #{regulation} AND lncRNA_name = #{lncnames} ) AND ( SELECT `End` FROM lncname_n WHERE Regulation_regions = #{regulation} AND lncRNA_name = #{lncnames} ) >`END`
select Biosample_Type from 450_select group by Biosample_Type
select Biosample_Name as label,Biosample_Name as value from 450_select where Biosample_Type = #{Biosample_Type} group by Biosample_Name

SELECT distinct * FROM ${tablename_450k} WHERE CHR = (select CHR from lncname_g where Regulation_regions = #{regulation} and lncRNA_name = #{lncnames}) and STAR > (select Start from lncname_g where Regulation_regions = #{regulation} and lncRNA_name = #{lncnames}) and (select End from lncname_g where Regulation_regions = #{regulation} and lncRNA_name = #{lncnames}) > STAR

CHR = (select CHR from lncname_n where Regulation_regions = #{regulation} and lncRNA_name = #{lncnames}) and STAR > (select Start from lncname_n where Regulation_regions = #{regulation} and lncRNA_name = #{lncnames}) and (select End from lncname_n where Regulation_regions = #{regulation} and lncRNA_name = #{lncnames}) > STAR
select Biosample_Type from wgbs_select group by Biosample_Type
select Biosample_Name as label,Biosample_Name as value from wgbs_select where Biosample_Type = #{Biosample_Type} group by Biosample_Name

SELECT distinct * FROM ${tablename_WGBS} WHERE CHR = (select CHR from lncname_g where Regulation_regions = #{regulation} and lncRNA_name = #{lncnames}) and STAR > (select Start from lncname_g where Regulation_regions = #{regulation} and lncRNA_name = #{lncnames}) and (select End from lncname_g where Regulation_regions = #{regulation} and lncRNA_name = #{lncnames}) > STAR
